name: The Unknown Fear
description:
A horror game focused on a mystery story. Unraveling this story and overcoming the unknown fear are the goal here, and nothing else matters.

The game is part of a series of original games called THE UNKNOWN FEAR which will be 5 horror and mystery games. Each game will tell a part of this story and only with the 5 will everything make sense.

In this first game you will play the role of a person who doesn't even remember his own name, but who will be forced to complete a task given by a mysterious scientist who is indifferent to his safety and promises in exchange his freedom and a new life.

----------

In Early Access the game will only have one ending, and limited to what the developer can do, but in its entirety it will have multiple endings, achievements and improvements to the design in general.
